name: City Mall Taxi Parking 3d: free simulation game
name_original: City Mall Taxi Parking 3d: free simulation game
description:
Do you love simulation games and real driving simulator controls ? If you really love best simulation games then here we are with city shopping mall Multi-storey taxi parking 3d as it has best car simulation driving controls as well challenge of real driver.
city shopping mall Multi-storey taxi parking 3d is about car simulation for taxi driver in the city shopping mall to park the taxi with simulator driving controls but realistic damage make this simple parking driving task into an experienced driver job. during parking you have to be very careful as city Multi-storey parking 3d need lots of parking experience . Simple minor mistake can be vital for your life. You need real car parking skills and mania for car driving as best car driver 3d in the city.

=== city shopping mall Multi-storey taxi parking 3d Feature ====
=== Enjoy realistic car simulation controls with real taxi simulator drive
=== play with lots modern and city taxi cars and parked them into their parking spot
=== drive with real 3d traffic and taxi parking sounds and effects
=== real city metro bus and car parking AI for other vehicles
=== Realistic car parking multi-storey 3d graphics specially designed for city taxi car parking game
=== All sorts of controls like touch , sensor and real wheel simulator controls for real driving skills
=== A series of levels for testing your parking simulation skills
